description:
"We will now begin Operation Summer!"  With Daichi`s words, the Blume takes off for Uranus and the fortress carrier Oberon.  But the Garm Engine, the Ark Faction`s final weapon, is there to stop them.  The Blume shakes off its attacks, but is enveloped in a strange light... and Daichi wakes up on his bed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 発動オペレーションサマー
